overview:
Michael O’Malley is the founder as well as the 100% owner of Point Financial, Inc. (“PFI”). His responsibilities range from sales and marketing, management, financial and credit review policies as well as oversight and direction for administration.

He is the General Partner of PFI Lease Fund I and sits or has sat on the boards of Unique Home Designs and Telesuite Corporation. Prior to founding PFI, Mr. O’Malley was the founder of PC Commercial, a division of Systems Marketing Inc., and Lessor of IBM computer equipment. PC Commercial was a front runner in the leasing of personal computers and experienced early success with leases to many Fortune 500 companies. Mr. O’Malley sold his interest in PC Commercial in 1988 to form PFI. In 1982, Mr. O’Malley began his leasing career as a District Manager for United States Leasing Company. He holds a BA in Economics from San Francisco State University.
